name: Dream World (DrSkort)
description:
Prisoned in a Dream

The only thing you remember is that you are dreaming and you can't wake up.

Will you escape the dream in this Rogue-Like Platformer ?

Avoid the strange creatures and find a way out of this nightmare.

Features:

  • An atmospheric soundtrack
  • A short story
  • A random generated Dream experience
  • A platforming challenge ;)

And there's only one thing to do:

Escape the Dream!

Also the game is still in development. If you enjoyed playing it, look out for updates :)
